remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a simple function" relative to the Bochner integral.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Feb-2018.)
statement:

issibf $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. dom ( W sitg M ) <-> ( F e. ( dom M MblFnM S ) /\ ran F e. Fin /\ A. x e. ( ran F \ { .0. } ) ( M ` ( `' F " { x } ) ) e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) ) ) $.
